ComicInfo.Title: Part Three: History
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Living Corpse's explosive return continues as our undead hero must face the fury of a five thousand year old Gatekeeper! But can The Living Corpse stand against someone that has thousands of years of practice with the powers of a Gatekeeper or will he fall before his will? Also, the Vampire Lilith has been captured by her clan of fellow Nosferatu. Will she escape before a gruesome fate befalls her? No, No, she can't. Join the Corpse Crew for another blood spattered issue of The Living Corpse!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser | 1 | B | Limited Edition Black & White Raw Edition Variant Cover | Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser | 2 |
